metadata.title: Driver's Product SWR Meter for CB Radio Antennas Heavy Duty Metal with SO-239 Input and Output with 1.5' Jumper Coax Cable - Black
features: EASY TO INSTALL! Compatible with all CB radios that have standard SO-239 connection, handheld models included
Works on the CB frequency range of 27 MHz
SWR readings ranging from 1:1 to 1:3 and has a 52 ohm impedance rating
Heavy duty metal case with dimensions of 3-3/8" x 2-1/4" x 3"
INCLUDES 1.5' jumper coax cable with PL-259 adapters
description: EASY TO USE, AND COMPATIBLE WITH ALL CB RADIOS WITH SO-239 CONNECTIONS, HANDHELDS INCLUDED! Professional product design and calibration, the Driver's Product SWR meter is every CB'ers 1st choice! This SWR Test Meter has been designed and developed to be the best in the industry and offer the best calibration for your CB.  What's Included? (1) SWR Meter (1) 1.5' Jumper Coax Cable with PL-259 Connectors Features and Benefits Include:  CB Radio Frequency Range: 27 MHz SWR 1:1 to 1:3  52 ohm impedance  SO-239 Input and Output Connectors  Heavy Duty Metal Case  Dimensions: 3 3/8 X 2 1/4 X 3 in  This meter measures only SWR readings and does not test for Wattage output from your radio. The heavy duty construction is guaranteed to last, and will not fail you like some of the plastic ones.  If you're looking for a true SWR meter that is guaranteed to give you accurate readings for your antenna set up, look no further. This meter is the best in class, and is not cheap like many of the lower end SWR meters on the market. Try this product today, and you'll be glad you did!
